title: Key West Half Marathon & 5K
seo_description: Calling all runners to Key West’s 20th annual Key West Half Marathon and 5K
contents:
Calling all runners to Key West’s 20th annual Key West Half Marathon and 5K

You will run through the historic district of Old Town Key West, along the waterfront to soak in the Gulf and Atlantic views, and the best part about it – the starting point is only one block from our resort!

Book now
short_description: Calling all runners to Key West’s 20th annual Key West Half Marathon and 5K
